attributes.action: Provide housing for people working in the police/fire services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that people working in the police/fire service should be provided with housing near to their station, or in the local area. This will be an excellent opportunity for them to learn the area around them, and also save them money on accomodation, as after all they are providing us with great help
